Preterit.text: Neyse mḥalaqqe mi gamiye Yawnon, qam Yunuṣ balәġә  kәmmina, kito nune, kǝmmina bu Turki Yunuṣ balәġә, hayo blәʕla Yawnon, w azzayo w azzayo, mbela hul l Ninwe lu sahil d Ninwe, ḥfәxla tamo, mḥalaqla li hno. And this thing, the lot also fell upon Jonah as a matter of fact. Well, they threw Jonah from the ship, then what we call Yunusbalığı, there are fishes, in Turkish we call them Yunusbalığı, it swallowed Jonah, and it went, it went, it brought him till Nineveh, to the shore of Nineveh, it vomited him out there, it threw him to this thing (shore). NE_254;22:10
